SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.graphics.face

Interface Face

All Superinterfaces:
Copyable<Face>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ColoredFace
public interface Face extends Copyable<Face>
A triangular face. Coordinates should be defined in counter-clockwise order.
